body.content:
Good Day Dear
Permit me to introduce my self to you and the reason why i contacted with
you through this email today,

I am Felix Damians the only son of late Harrison  Damians of tribal land.
My father was a very wealthy traditional ruler, poisoned to death by his
rivals in the traditional tussle about royalties and related matters that
was few years ago.

Before his sudden death he called me on his sick bed and told me that he
deposited the sum of $3.4m in one of the bank and it was because of the
wealth and his money he was poisoned by his rivals according to him.

What i am seeking is your help to receive the money into an account over
there in your country and to invest the money into any good business of
your choice which will be profited as my late father advised before his
sudden death,

I am seeking for a foreign partner where I will transfer the money and
investment the money as you may advise. I am willing to offer you part of
the money as a compensation for your effort/input towards the transfer,

I am waiting to hear from you soon to enable me to give you some legal
prove and details of the deposit.
Thanks and remain bless
Yours Felix
